dcterms:creator: Maël Jullien
Marco Valentino
André Freitas
dcterms:description: The NLI4CT dataset is derived from Clinical Trial Reports (CTRs) on breast cancer, containing 999 CTRs with sections on Eligibility Criteria, Intervention, Results, and Adverse Events. It includes single and comparison instances labeled as entailment or contradiction.
dcterms:title: NLI4CT

dcterms:creator: Chaitanya Shivade
et al.
dcterms:description: MedNLI is a natural language inference dataset specifically designed for the clinical domain, providing instances for training models to understand entailment and contradiction in medical contexts.
dcterms:title: MedNLI

dcterms:creator: Lisa Grossman Liu
Raymond H Grossman
Elliot G Mitchell
Chunhua Weng
Karthik Natarajan
George Hripcsak
David K Vawdrey
dcterms:description: A comprehensive database of medical abbreviations and acronyms, containing over 104,000 entries linked to corresponding senses, aimed at supporting natural language processing in the biomedical domain.
dcterms:title: Medical Abbreviation and Acronym Meta-Inventory

dcterms:creator: Shaina Raza
Deepak John Reji
Femi Shajan
Syed Raza Bashir
dcterms:description: Maccrobat is a dataset focused on named entity recognition in biomedicine and epidemiology, facilitating the extraction of biomedical entities from text.
dcterms:title: Maccrobat
